channel.title: How do I change exp at dummys?
channel.description: please help me idk how lol

item.title: How do I change exp at dummys?
item.dc:creator: @xxchainxx xxchainxx
item.description:
@xxchainxx wrote:

here u go this is for doors and hay bales

case 1531: if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You start hitting the door"); actionTimer = 20; setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((100000*playerLevel[2]), 2); addSkillXP((100000*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((100000*playerLevel[18]), 18); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } break;

heres hay bales

case 299: if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("WHAT ARE YOU A HORSE?"); addSkillXP((10000*playerLevel[1]), 1); addSkillXP((10000*playerLevel[18]), 18); actionTimer = 20; setAnimation(0x320); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } break;

just replaces those with your old ones

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change exp at dummys?

item.title: How do I change exp at dummys?
item.dc:creator: @masterp00n masterp00n
item.description:
@masterp00n wrote:

yah just search that on client.java instead of searching for case 823…and to go to it faster…just search “dummy” with out the " and if you wanna change strength exp(when you hit the door) search door do you get it?

item.source: How do I change exp at dummys?

item.title: How do I change exp at dummys?
item.dc:creator: @csrsniper254 csrsniper254
item.description:
@csrsniper254 wrote:

In client.java search for case 823.

Make it look like this:

case 823: if (actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You attack the dummy!"); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((600*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((300*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[18]), 18); actionTimer = 12; } break;

600, 300, and 150 is the exp added.

Read full topic
